_sText:
Cs_tuscany

Map by Sivi(DDC)

A big thanks to Zom-B(DDC), who helped me with a lot of the technical bits such as the radar overlay and cubemaps <3 xx


Situation:

Terrorists have taken control of the mayors house in a sleepy little village in Tuscany, Italy.
The mayor and some of his advisors have been taken hostage in his house.
Counter-Terrorist operatives have been deployed by the castle grounds ready to move in and escort the hostages to safety.



Terrorist Objectives:

Prevent the Counter-Terrorists from rescuing the hostages by either wiping them all out or letting the time count down.



Counter-Terrorist Objectives:

Ensure that the Terrorists are wiped our or rescue the hostages within the time limit given.
